forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally cloudy. High 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally cloudy. High 54F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 51F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
